name: Moscow Mule
ingredients: 2 oz. vodka, 3 oz. ginger beer, and the juice of half a lime
description: Squeeze half a lime into a copper mug, drop in the rind, and add 3 ice cubes. Then pour in vodka and fill the mug with cold ginger beer (not ginger ale!). Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Greyhound
ingredients: 2 oz vodka and 2 oz grapefruit juice
description: Add vodka to a collins glass filled with ice. Then add some fresh grapefruit juice, stir, and garnish it with a lemon or lime wedge.

name: The Lebowski
ingredients: 2 oz vodka, 1 oz Kahlúa, and heavy cream
description: Combine vodka and Kahlúa in an Old Fashioned glass filled with ice. Then tops it off with a big splash of heavy cream and stir. Make the Dude proud.

name: Manhattan
ingredients: 2.5 oz Bourbon, 1 oz Sweet Vermouth, 3 dashes Bitters, and 1 maraschino cherry
description: Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir vigorously, then strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with one to two speared cherries.

name: Whiskey Sour
ingredients: .75 oz Fresh lemon juice, .75 oz Simple syrup (one part water, one part sugar), and 1.5 oz Bourbon
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon wedge.

name: Bone Machine
ingredients: 1 oz Bourbon, 1.5 oz Sherry, .5 oz Amaro Nonino, .25 oz Bénédictine, 3 dashes of orange bitters, and 1 large ice cube
description: In a mixing glass filled with ice, add bourbon, sherry, amaro, Bénédictine, bitters and stirs. Strain into an Old-fashioned Glass filled with one large ice cube. Finally, flame an orange peel over the glass.

name: Painkiller
ingredients: 2 oz Rum, 4 oz Pineapple juice, 1 oz Orange juice, and 1 oz Cream of coconut
description: Adds all the ingredients to a Hurricane glass, fill it with ice, and stir. Garnish with an orange wedge, a cherry and freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Black Key
ingredients: 2 oz Mount Gay Black Barrel Rum, .5 oz maple syrup, 1 dash bitters, and 1 dash orange bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and shake without ice for about 10 to 15 seconds. Then add ice and shake again for 30 to 45 seconds. Finally, strain it into a rocks glass over a large ice cube and garnish with a lemon peel and a maraschino cherry.

name: Hurricane
ingredients: 2 oz White rum, 2 oz Dark rum, 1 oz Lime juice, 1 oz Orange juice, 2 oz Passion fruit juice, .5 oz Simple syrup (one part sugar, one part water), and .5 oz Grenadine
description: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker glass filled with ice. Shake and strain it into a large Hurricane glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange half-wheel and a cherry.
